ygData.subject: RE: EQ and Laptops
ygData.msgSnippet: But they are still two separate characters..correct??? just same name and class..right? ... From:	Steven Cobb [mailto:cobb@systemsexpress.com] Sent:	Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
But they are still two separate characters..correct??? just same name and
class..right?


-----Original Message-----
From: Steven Cobb [mailto:cobb@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 1:49 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] EQ and Laptops

From: Steven Cobb <cobb@...>

A little hint:

I noticed that the *.opt files are kept on my local
harddrive. They seem to have the
hotbutton layouts on them. It could save you a little effort
in re-mapping the
buttons if you copy them to the laptop. At least the one for
the character you are
playing. (eg. if the char you are playing is named Smitty
then copy the smitty.opt
file to the laptop's EQ directory. When I found this out, I
was tickled. Now I try to
create the same class/name on any server I log into. (E Marr
goes down a lot and it's
nice having a backup game on another server.)

MFerrulo@... wrote:
>
> From: MFerrulo@...
>
> I am going on the road for 2 weeks and may get a laptop so
I can play while
> travelling. Anyone ever see a EQ played on Laptop? Is it
possible? Any
> advice as to what kind of not to expensive laptop to get?
>
> I do not expect the performance of my desk top - just
something playable :)
>
> Wizaro WrathCaster
> Solusek Ro
